name: Flocking
description:
This is a flocking demo that supports up to 10k agents.

The sliders on the top left corner control everything and are self explanatory (I hope)

Rotate the camera with the mouse by pressing right click and dragging and move with WASD. Speed boost by holding Shift.

Don't worry if you get bad frames when going with huge numbers, you can always set the time scale to 0, which will stop the calculations and let you move around freely
